summary.subject: ISSRE 2025: Workshops Call for Papers (Deadline July 21)
summary.description: ISSRE (International Symposium on Software Reliability Engineering) is the leading conference on software reliability, focusing on approaches, techniques, and tools for assessing, predicting, and improving the reliability, safety, and security of software systems.

workshops.description: Workshops at ISSRE provide opportunities for collaboration and information exchange among industry practitioners and academic researchers, discussing recent developments and open challenges in engineering high-assurance software.
